授業方法:
The instructor will deliver micro lectures each week to introduce the themes of the course to help the students to become familiar with major conceptual discussions from the discipline. Based on the content of the micro lectures, students will prepare for academic discussion and debate on the particular theme. Each class will have an emphasis on students demonstrating their understanding of the class topics, and the homework assignments will reinforce students' learning and understanding of a particular theme.

(Information for students permitted to take classes online)
Data recorded from face-to-face-classes for Sessions 4 and onwards will be broadcast on-demand. (Sessions 1-3 will be shared via materials that will be uploaded to this syllabi).

*IMPORTANT* From Week 2 of classes, this course will be offered via a hybrid of on-demand and zoom classes. I will set out the instructions on LUNA for course members to follow. These instructions will include how to access all course materials including worksheets, PowerPoint slides etc.
